00079     class ParserBuilder

00083          * Prefixes
00084          */

00086                       PREFIX_CONST = 1,
00087                       PREFIX_URGENT = 2,
00088                       PREFIX_BROADCAST = 4,
00089                       PREFIX_URGENT_BROADCAST = 6,
00090                       PREFIX_META = 8 };
